banner.title: <0>Elevate Your Insights:</0> Delvio's Advanced Research Solutions
banner.desc: Discover a realm of possibilities with Delvio's cutting-edge research solutions, enabling smarter decisions for individuals, businesses, and academic pursuits across diverse fields.

tab1.title: Research Service
tab1.desc: Custom research services combining qualitative and quantitative methods for comprehensive results.

tab2.title: Survey Service & Tools
tab2.desc: Intuitive survey tools for all your research needs, from business to academic, with easy and efficient access.

section2.title: Get to Know <0>Delvio</0>
section2.desc: We're more than service providers; we're dedicated research partners. Delvio combines human expertise with technology to simplify data collection, conduct comprehensive research, and deliver tailored insights for your Business, Individual, and Academic needs.

card1.title: Data-Driven Research Methodology
card1.desc: We apply a data-driven approach for more accurate and reliable results.

card2.title: Continuous Technological Innovation
card2.desc: We are committed to technological innovation to continually enhance your research experience.

card3.title: Targeted & Quality Respondent Network
card3.desc: Gain access to our evolving network of targeted and high-quality respondents, ensuring diverse and top-tier responses.

card4.title: Expert Team Support
card4.desc: Receive support from our expert team ready to assist in every step of your research.

card1.title: What makes Delvio different from other service providers?
card1.desc: We offer a unique combination of advanced technology, a wide respondent network, and unparalleled expert team support.

card2.title: How does Delvio work in handling research projects?
card2.desc: We collaborate with clients, understand their needs, and apply the best research strategies for optimal results.

demo.title: Realize Your Dream <0>Research Now!</0>
demo.desc: Join the leading research and survey platform. Discover new insights, knowledges, and make better decisions with <1>Delvio!</1>
